title: The Favorites  - NFC East Betting Preview with Ross Tucker
itunes:title: The Favorites  - NFC East Betting Preview with Ross Tucker
description:
NFL veteran-turned-media personality Ross Tucker joins Action Network gambling experts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter for a dive into the NFC East. Tucker is an expert on this division, with two stops within the NFC East during a seven-year NFL career, plus his current job as an analyst for the Philadelphia Eagles. Plus, he's the co-host of the sports betting podcast "Even Money," so he's happy to expound on his favorite division odds and season win totals from Dallas to New York and everywhere in between. He provides some great advice about how to approach your high school reunion... if you can find a way to play for the Cowboys on Thanksgiving Day. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
